marytts.htsengine
Class HTSParameterGeneration

java.lang.Object
  marytts.htsengine.HTSParameterGeneration

public class HTSParameterGeneration
extends java.lang.Object

Parameter generation out of trained HMMs. Java port and extension of HTS engine version 2.0 Extension: mixed excitation

Author:
Marcela Charfuelan

HTS maximum likelihood parameter generation

Parameters:
um - : utterance model sequence after processing Mary context features
ms - : HMM pdfs model set.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

loadLogF0FromExternalFile

public void loadLogF0FromExternalFile(java.lang.String lf0File,
                                      int totalDurationFrames)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
Load logf0, in HTS format, create a voiced array and set this values in pdf2par This contour should be aligned with the durations, so the total duration in frames should be the same as in the lf0 file

Parameters:
lf0File: - in HTS formant
totalDurationFrames: - the total duration in frames can be calculated as: totalDurationFrames = totalDurationInSeconds / (framePeriodInSamples / SamplingFrequencyInHz)
pdf2par: - HTSParameterGeneration object
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If the number of frames in the lf0 file is not the same as represented in the total duration (in frames).
